statements.select: select isnull(max(c.create_flag),0) create_flag ,isnull(max(c.modify_flag),0) modify_flag ,isnull(max(c.approve_flag),0) approve_flag ,isnull(max(c.reject_flag),0) reject_flag ,isnull(max(c.cancel_flag),0) delete_flag ,a.bill_id From T_Bill a inner join T_Def_Bill_Action_Role b on(a.bill_kind_id = b.bill_kind_id and a.bill_Status = b.pre_bill_status) inner join T_Def_Bill_Action c on(b.bill_action_id = c.bill_action_id) where 1=1 and a.bill_id = #BillId# and b.role_id = #RoleId# and c.[status] = '1' group by a.bill_id;
